foreignData.text: 渲色～对由你操控的每个生物而言，该牌的法术力费用中每有一个白色法术力符号，它便得+1/+1。

name: Light from Within
originalText: Chroma Each creature you control gets +1/+1 for each white mana symbol in its mana cost.

rulings.text: Chroma abilities check only mana costs, which are found in a card’s upper right corner. They don’t count mana symbols that appear in a card’s text box.
Chroma abilities count hybrid mana symbols of the appropriate color. For example, a card with mana cost {3}{U/R}{U/R} has two red mana symbols in its mana cost.

Light from Within affects each creature individually. For example, if you control a creature with mana cost {1}{W}{W} and a creature with mana cost {W/B}{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}, the first creature gets +2/+2 and the second creature gets +5/+5.

text: Chroma — Each creature you control gets +1/+1 for each white mana symbol in its mana cost.
